metadata.title: CVE-2023-4576 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - negligible
metadata.description: On Windows, an integer overflow could occur in`RecordedSourceSurfaceCreation` which resulted in a heap buffer overflowpotentially leaking sensitive data that could have led to a sandbox escape.*This bug only affects Firefox on Windows. Other operating systems areunaffected.* This vulnerability affects Firefox < 117, Firefox ESR <102.15, Firefox ESR < 115.2, Thunderbird < 102.15, and Thunderbird < 115.2.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'only affects macOS').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'only affects Windows').
mozjs78: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'only affects macOS').
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'only affects macOS').
mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'only affects macOS').
